name: Archana Shaji
title: Embroidery Designer & Embroidery Manager
heroQuote: Embroidery is architecture made from thread, light, and patience.
intro: I design and direct haute couture embroidery programs that balance experimental artistry with atelier execution discipline.
philosophy: I treat every panel as a composition of texture, density, and reflection.
Luxury is communicated through restraint, consistency, and finishing details.
Management is a creative medium: planning, sourcing, and handover quality shape the final garment.
managementHighlights: Led multi-atelier embroidery production across couture and red-carpet timelines.
Built technique documentation systems to improve repeatability and quality control.
Directed sampling pipelines from concept drawing to final fitting approvals.
